overview:
Baby Shower Station is a one-stop baby shower planning solution. Millions of babies are born every year and each and every one of us all agree that babies are a great reason to celebrate, that is why I decided I wanted to be a part of that joyous event.

I dedicated 3 years of my life, every single day doing research, getting feedback from hundreds of people, finding great content, tips and great buys all with the intention of making your journey a lot easier. I could never imagine their was so much to offer! It is an ongoing process, since I am finding new and updated content every day. I enjoy every minute of it!

My mission is to build a web site that will bring all your baby shower needs to life! My vision is to make your event a great success!
